'''Everflame Seed''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]]. When standing near an activated Everflame Seed, the player's [[Phlogiston]] meter will be refilled.

Everflame Seeds will be automatically activated when [[Iansan]] in her Rushing Thunderbolt mode, [[Varesa]] in her Sudden Onrush mode, or an indwelled [[Tatankasaurus]] in the Spirited state passes by one. This does not apply in [[Ochkanatlan]]<!-- ancient and common variant --> and [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]].

==Trivia==
* Some Everflame Seeds in the wild cannot be activated. Others will only activate in response to a [[Time Trial Challenge]].
